info.name: Ultrasooq API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for the Ultrasooq e-commerce platform backend.

Base URL: {{baseUrl}}/api/v1/
Swagger Docs: {{baseUrl}}/api-docs

All mutation endpoints require Bearer token authentication.
Health endpoints do NOT use the /api/v1/ prefix.

request.description: Refresh an expired access token using refresh token

item.description: User registration, profile, addresses, roles, permissions, accounts

item.name: Product
item.description: Product CRUD, pricing, reviews, Q&A, RFQ, factories, buy-group, dropship, wholesale, AI

request.description: Get seller product list with pagination
